trans-unit.source: Provides designer functionality for user controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項提供設計工具的功能。

trans-unit.source: There is no developer advantage to creating your own designer derived from UserControlDesigner.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何開發人員優勢來建立衍生自 UserControlDesigner 自己設計工具。

trans-unit.source: To enhance the design-time experience for a custom control, derive your control from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> and your designer from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 若要增強的自訂控制項的設計階段經驗，衍生您的控制項與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl>您的設計工具從<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl>

trans-unit.source: In that case, you would not use an .ascx file for your ASP.NET markup.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您不會使用.ascx 檔 ASP.NET 標記。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UserControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UserControlDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the action list collection for the user control designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者控制項設計工具的動作清單集合。

trans-unit.source: This implementation creates two <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> objects in the collection: **Edit User Control** and **Refresh**.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會建立兩個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>集合中的物件︰**編輯使用者控制項**和**重新整理**。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that contains the action list tags for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref>控制項設計工具包含的動作清單的標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user control can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以調整使用者控制項的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML markup that is used to represent the user control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來表示在設計階段的使用者控制項的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用來代表控制項設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property of a child control is empty or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>子控制項的屬性是空的或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>
